Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #12 Roosevelt Reroute at Roosevelt/Western
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted near Roosevelt/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ogden, Western, Roosevelt, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Reroute near  near Lake Shore Drive/ Addison
ShortDescription: Northbound 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore buses are temporarily rerouted near Lake Shore Drive/ Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore  buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Belmont, Sheridan, Irving Park, Lake Shore Drive, and resume normal route: due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/ Addison.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
